title: Senior PHP Developer
desc: We don’t have core values, because values mean nothing without action. So these are our core behaviors.
responsibilities: Collaborating with prospective users and clients to understand and anticipate their needs and translate them into product requirements
Overseeing all stages of product creation including design and development
Identify and fill product gaps and generate new ideas that grow market share, improve customer experience, and drive growth
Develop buy-in for the product vision both internally and with key external partners
Organize product launches including working with the public relations team, executives, and other product management team members
Drive product launches and communication with customers and key stakeholders
Translate product ideas into tangible assets by creating wireframes, 3D renderings, prototypes, and minimum viable products (MVPs) to test assumptions and validate customer interests
Incorporate feature requests into the product roadmap
Groom and prioritize backlog keeping track of industry trends
Develop user stories and define acceptance criteria
Set sprint goals, plan releases and upgrades
Follow the progress of work and address production issues during sprints
Analyze preferences and requests of end users, Liaising with the product team and end users to deliver updates
Refine our agile methodology based on results and client feedback
qualifications: 2-5 years experience of working on a Product Management and relevant fields

Significant experience in establishing, organizing, and leading a team. You must know the typical product development life cycle and be able to select the right development methodology for the product and the target market
Good understanding of software development and web technologies
Strong problem-solving skills and high responsibility
Strong ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams in a matrix organization
MS or BS degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or other relevant area
